article_title: Sam Brownback endorses Marco Rubio for president
article_text:
Brownback’s son-in-law works on the senator’s campaign

Kansas caucuses take place March 5

Brownback says Rubio will unite the party

article_metadata.news-keywords: Marco Rubio, Sam Brownback, Election 2016, caucus, endorsement
article_metadata.description: Gov. Sam Brownback has endorsed U.S. Sen. Marco Rubio for president with less than a month before the Kansas caucuses.
article_metadata.title: Sam Brownback endorses Marco Rubio for president | The Wichita Eagle
